title: Minister of Foreign Affairs received by Tunisian President, Kais Saied
text:
Minister of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad, Mr Ramtane Lamamra, finished his working visit to Tunisia, during which he was received by Tunisian President, Kais Saied.
On this occasion, Foreign Minister Ramtane Lamamra conveyed to the Tunisian President the fraternal greetings of President Abdelmadjid Tebboune, stressing his firm commitment to strengthening the relations of brotherhood and solidarity between the two countries.
The minister further conveyed his greetings to the Algerian community in Tunisia.
The meeting was an opportunity to discuss the state of bilateral relations and prospects for strengthening them so that the two countries face the common challenges more effectively, including the Covid-19 pandemic.
During their meeting the two officials addressed regional and international issues of common interest, including the situation in the Maghreb region, the Sahelo-Saharan region, and in the Arab world.
In addition, Mr LAMAMRA held a working session with his Tunisian counterpart, Mr. Othman Jerandi, during which the two heads of diplomacy noted with satisfaction the convergence of their positions on issues of common interest to regional and international levels and agreed to work for the preservation and strengthening of the successful tradition of consultation and coordination within all regional and international fora.
